title: Turret Priorities
description: Allows this entity to prioritize specific targets over others, and to do so conditionally as well.

target-filter.title: Target Filter
target-filter.description: A valid Factorio entity belonging to an enemy force of this turret.

index.description: The index of the filter in the turret's GUI, 1-indexed.

priority_list.title: Priority List
priority_list.description: The (static) list of priority targets that this turret should aim for. Overwritten by circuit network signals if `'set_priority_list'` is `true`.

ignore_unprioritized.title: Ignore Unprioritized
ignore_unprioritized.description: Whether or not to completely ignore enemies that do not lie in this turret's target priority lists.

set_priority_list.title: Set Priority List
set_priority_list.description: Whether or not this entity should set its target priorities via connected circuit network signals.

set_ignore_unprioritized.title: Set Ignore Unprioritized
set_ignore_unprioritized.description: Whether or not this entity should have it's ignore unprioritized behavior be set conditionally via `'ignore_unlisted_targets_condition'`.

ignore_unlisted_targets_condition.title: Ignore Unlisted Targets Condition
ignore_unlisted_targets_condition.description: A condition which must be true in order for non-prioritized targets to be entirely ignored when this turret is targeting. Does nothing unless `'set_ignore_unprioritized'` is `true`.
